section.title: Quick Start Guide: v1.1
section.p: This guide will help you get started with the application.

section.title: 1. Introduction
section.p: This application provides a document management platform with role-based access control and a user-friendly interface.

section.title: 2. Quick Setup
section.p: To begin, you'll need to complete the following steps:

ul.li: Create .env files and configuration scripts for managing API base URLs and environment-specific settings.
Set up React Router DOM for main application navigation.
Configure React Router with Protected Routes.
Document Dashboard: As an authenticated user, you can view a list of all documents you own. This dashboard allows you to create, edit, and delete documents.

Role-Based Access Control: The application implements role-based access control (RBAC) with roles such as Admin, Editor, and Viewer. Admins have full control, while Editors can create and edit content, and Viewers have read-only access.

section.title: 4. Next Steps
section.p: Refer to official product documentation for more information on advanced features and configurations.
